biography_text: JOYCE, John, a Representative from Pennsylvania; born in Altoona, Blair County, Pa., February 8, 1957; graduated from Bishop Guilfoyle High School, Altoona, Pa., 1975; attended Pennsylvania State University, Altoona, Pa., 1975-1977; B.S., Pennsylvania State University, University Park, Pa., 1979; M.D., Temple University, Philadelphia, Pa., 1983; dermatologist; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: Pennsylvania State University, University Park, Pa.
